aiSettings.title: AI Settings
aiSettings.subtitle: Personalize Your AI Companion
aiSettings.introDescription: Adjust AI's personality, tone and abilities based on your preferences, so AI can better understand and support you.

supportive.name: Warm & Supportive
supportive.description: Like a friend, warm and providing emotional support

wise.name: Wise Mentor
wise.description: Like a mentor, wise and providing deep insights

gentle.name: Gentle Companion
gentle.description: Like family, gentle and patient listener

energetic.name: Energetic Motivator
energetic.description: Like a coach, positive and inspiring energy

warm.name: Warm & Kind
warm.description: Warm tone, like a close friend

standard.name: Standard Mode
standard.description: Balanced AI capabilities, suitable for daily conversations

empathetic.name: Empathetic Mode
empathetic.description: Focused on emotional understanding, high empathy

aiSettings.resetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all AI settings to recommended values? This cannot be undone.
aiSettings.resetSuccessMessage: All AI settings have been reset to recommended values.
aiSettings.logoutFromAIMessage: Are you sure you want to logout from AI services? You will need to re-authenticate.

proactiveSupport.title: Proactive Support
proactiveSupport.description: Allow AI to proactively provide care and advice, giving emotional support at the right time.

smartSuggestions.title: Smart Suggestions
smartSuggestions.description: Enable AI's smart suggestion feature, guiding users to self-explore through questions and reflections.

learningMode.title: Learning Mode
learningMode.description: Enable AI's learning mode, remember user patterns and preferences, providing more personalized support.

voiceEnabled.title: Voice Function
voiceEnabled.description: Enable voice interaction features, allowing AI to communicate through voice.

crisisDetection.title: Crisis Detection
crisisDetection.description: Enable psychological crisis detection function, timely identify risk signals and provide appropriate support.

therapeuticSettings.title: Therapeutic Settings
therapeuticSettings.subtitle: Choose therapeutic approaches that suit you

cbt.name: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
cbt.description: Focus on relationships between thought patterns and behaviors, helping identify and change negative thinking

dbt.name: Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT)
dbt.description: Focus on emotion regulation, interpersonal skills, and distress tolerance

act.name: Acceptance Commitment Therapy (ACT)
act.description: Emphasize accepting difficult emotions while focusing on value-driven action

humanistic.name: Humanistic Therapy
humanistic.description: Person-centered approach emphasizing self-actualization and personal growth

psychodynamic.name: Psychodynamic Therapy
psychodynamic.description: Explore unconscious processes and how early experiences affect current behavior

mindfulness.name: Mindfulness-Based Therapy
mindfulness.description: Cultivate present-moment awareness, reduce rumination and anxiety

directive.name: Directive
directive.description: Therapist-led, providing clear guidance and advice

collaborative.name: Collaborative
collaborative.description: Therapist and client explore and solve problems together

non-directive.name: Non-directive
non-directive.description: Client-led, therapist provides support and reflection

asian.name: Asian Culture
asian.description: Understanding collectivist values and family relationships

indigenous.name: Indigenous Culture
indigenous.description: Respecting traditional wisdom and community connections

multicultural.name: Multicultural
multicultural.description: Integrating understanding from multiple cultural backgrounds

analytical.name: Analytical
analytical.description: Deep analysis of problem roots and patterns

surface.name: Surface
surface.description: Light conversation, avoiding deep sensitive topics

deep.name: Deep
deep.description: Deep exploration of core issues and emotions

shield.title: Your Privacy is Protected
shield.description: We use industry-leading security measures, including end-to-end encryption, to ensure your information is secure.

rightsSummary.title: Your Rights Summary
rightsSummary.description: You have complete control over your data. You can view, modify, delete, or export your information at any time.

overview.title: 1. Overview
content: Rebloom ("we", "our", or "Company") values your privacy rights. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and process your personal information.
This Policy applies to all personal information you provide when using the Rebloom application ("Service").
By using our service, you agree that we may process your information according to this Privacy Policy.

informationCollected.title: 2. Information We Collect
content: We may collect the following types of personal information:
• Account Information: Name, email address, phone number
• Profile Information: Age, gender, location, preferences
• Health-related Information: Mood data, conversation records, mental health preferences
• Usage Data: Application usage statistics, feature usage
• Device Information: Device type, operating system, unique identifiers
• Emergency Contact Information: Details of emergency contacts you designate

collectionMethods.title: 3. How We Collect Information
content: We collect information through the following methods:
• Direct Provision: Information you actively provide when using the service
• Automatic Collection: Usage data automatically collected through the application
• Third-party Services: Information obtained through integrated third-party services
• Analytics Tools: Using analytics tools to understand service usage

informationUse.title: 4. How We Use Information
content: We use the collected information to:
• Provide and improve our services
• Personalize your experience
• Ensure service security and reliability
• Provide customer support
• Analyze usage trends and improve features
• Comply with legal obligations
• Protect user and public safety

informationSharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and do not sell your personal information. We may share information in the following circumstances:
• With your explicit consent
• Legal requirements or rights protection
• Emergency situations to protect user safety
• Sharing with authorized service providers (limited to necessary purposes)
• Business transfers or mergers
• Anonymized or aggregated data for analysis

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
content: We implement multi-layered security measures to protect your information:
• End-to-end Encryption: All conversations and sensitive data are encrypted
• Access Control: Strict employee access permission management
• Secure Storage: Using industry-standard secure storage solutions
• Regular Audits: Regular security audits and updates
• Incident Response: 24/7 security monitoring and incident response plan

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
content: We retain your information:
• During Account Activity: Retain all usage data
• After Account Deletion: Retain necessary information to comply with legal obligations
• Automatic Deletion: Automatically delete old data based on your settings
• Minimal Retention: Only retain information necessary to provide services

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights
content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
• Right to Access: View your personal information we hold
• Right to Rectification: Update or correct inaccurate information
• Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal information
• Right to Data Portability: Obtain your data in a structured format
• Right to Restrict Processing: Limit our processing of your information
• Right to Object: Object to processing of your information based on legitimate interests
• Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent to data processing at any time

cookiesTracking.title: 9. Cookies and Tracking
content: We use the following technologies to enhance your experience:
• Essential Functions: Necessary cookies for application functionality
• Analytics Tools: Anonymous usage statistics to improve services
• Performance Monitoring: Monitor application performance and errors
• You can control tracking preferences through application settings

childrensPrivacy.title: 10. Children's Privacy
content: Our service is primarily intended for users 18 and older.
If we discover we have collected information from children under 13, we will delete it immediately.
For users under 18, we encourage parental supervision.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

dataTransfer.title: 11. Cross-border Data Transfer
content: Your information may be transferred and processed in different countries/regions.
We ensure all transfers comply with applicable data protection laws.
We use standard contractual clauses and other protective measures.
We only transfer data to countries with adequate protection levels.

thirdPartyServices.title: 12. Third-party Services
content: Our service may contain links to third-party services:
• We do not control third-party privacy practices
• Please review third-party privacy policies
• We are not responsible for third-party service privacy practices
• Using third-party services indicates agreement to their privacy policies

policyUpdates.title: 13. Privacy Policy Updates
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Material changes will be notified through app notifications or email.
Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated policy.
We recommend reviewing this Privacy Policy regularly.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
content: If you have any questions or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact our Privacy Officer:
Email: privacy@Rebloom.app
Address: Shanghai, China
We will respond to your requests within 30 days.
The Privacy Officer will assist you in exercising your rights.

• Any other relevant information

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Rebloom is committed to enabling everyone to access high-quality mental health support. We believe technology can make mental health services more accessible, convenient, and effective. Through the combination of AI technology and professional psychological knowledge, we provide users with 24/7 emotional support and personalized mental health guidance.

about.tagline: With love and technology, we protect every heart

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: These terms govern your rights and responsibilities when using Rebloom services. Please read carefully.
terms.agreementText: By continuing to use Rebloom, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms of service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: Welcome to Rebloom ("the Service" or "the Application"). These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legal agreement between you and the Rebloom team ("we," "our," or "the Company").
By downloading, installing, or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Service.
These Terms apply to the Application itself and all its features, services, and content.

services.title: 2. Service Description
content: Rebloom is an AI-powered mental health support application that provides the following services:
• 24/7 emotional support and mental health guidance
• Personalized AI conversation experiences
• Mood tracking and health insights
• Crisis resources and emergency contact features
• Personalized AI settings and therapy preferences
• Conversation records and progress tracking

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
content: You must be 18 years or older, or use this service under parental supervision.
You commit to providing true, accurate, and complete information.
You agree not to use the service in any illegal or unauthorized manner.
You understand that this service is not a substitute for emergency mental health services.

responsibilities.title: 4. User Responsibilities
content: You agree to:
• Provide accurate personal information
• Protect your account security
• Not share your login credentials
• Not use the service in harmful ways
• Respect other users' privacy
• Seek professional help in emergency situations

availability.title: 5. Service Availability
content: We strive to provide high-quality services, but cannot guarantee:
• Continuous service availability
• Service interruptions or errors
• Availability of specific features
We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate services at any time.

dataPrivacy.title: 6. Data and Privacy
content: Your privacy is of utmost importance to us. Our Privacy Policy details how we collect, use, and protect your information.
By using this service, you agree that we may process your data according to our Privacy Policy.
We use end-to-end encryption to protect your conversations and personal information.
You are responsible for your data, including backing up important information.

ownership.title: 7. Content Ownership
content: The Application and all its content, including but not limited to:
• Software code and algorithms
• Design and user interface
• Trademarks and brand elements
• Intellectual property
are owned by Rebloom.

userContent.title: 8. User Content
content: You retain ownership of content you create in this service.
By using the service, you grant us a limited license to provide the service.
You promise not to upload harmful, illegal, or content that infringes others' rights.
We reserve the right to remove content that violates our policies when appropriate.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
content: The service is provided "as is" without any warranties of any kind.
We do not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or suitability of the service.
This service is not a substitute for professional mental health services.
In emergency situations, please contact professional medical personnel immediately.

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.
Our total liability shall not exceed the service fees you paid in the past 12 months.
Some jurisdictions do not allow liability limitations, which may not apply to you.

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
content: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, losses, or damages arising from your violation of these Terms.
This includes reasonable attorneys' fees and court costs.

termination.title: 12. Termination
content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time if:
• You violate these Terms
• Your behavior is harmful to other users
• Required by law
You may stop using the service by deleting your account at any time.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China.
Any disputes shall be resolved in the Pudong New Area People's Court of Shanghai.
If any provision is found invalid, the remaining provisions shall remain in effect.

modifications.title: 14. Modifications
content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time.
Material changes will be notified through the app or email.
Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: 15. Contact Us
content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
Email: legal@Rebloom.app
Address: Shanghai, China
We will respond to your inquiries within a reasonable time.
